name: We Have to Talk
description:
Have you ever found yourself in a situation where your relationship was hanging by a thread? You’ve tried to save it, but everything failed. It’s alright, buddy. No need to jump above your head. But remember that all good things must come to an end. You can just delay the inevitable… 

Here are our hard workers. Maybe they'll have better luck than our little Dude:

Game designers: Oleg_Bone, KL

Artists: Oleg_Bone, satacat

Coders: kndratova, rekkorize

The Soundman: rekkorize

Controls:

  • A/D – to move 
  • W/S – to use stairs 
  • Space – to interact
